values.title: Our Philosophy
values.subtitle: Beauty That Honors Nature & Tradition
values.pureIngredientsDesc: We source only the finest organic botanicals from trusted Moroccan farms and cooperatives.
values.handcraftedDesc: Each product is carefully formulated and made in small batches to ensure quality.
values.ancientWisdomDesc: Our recipes draw from centuries of Moroccan beauty traditions and herbal knowledge.
values.sustainableDesc: We support local communities and use eco-friendly packaging for a better planet.

ingredients.title: Ingredients & Benefits
ingredients.subtitle: Nature's Finest
ingredients.description: We source the purest botanical treasures from Morocco and beyond.
ingredients.antiAgingDesc: Reduces fine lines and restores youthful radiance
ingredients.soothingDesc: Calms irritation and sensitive skin gently
ingredients.organicDesc: Pure, natural ingredients with no chemicals

process.title: Our Production Process
process.subtitle: Artisanal Craft
process.description: From raw ingredients to your hands, every step is guided by tradition and care.
process.rawIngredientsDesc: We source the finest organic botanicals directly from trusted Moroccan farms and cooperatives.
process.coldPressingDesc: Traditional cold-press extraction preserves all nutrients and ensures maximum potency.
process.handMixingDesc: Our artisans carefully blend each formula by hand, following time-honored recipes.
process.ecoPackagingDesc: Products are packaged in sustainable, recyclable materials ready for your ritual.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Got Questions?
faq.description: Everything you need to know about our products and policies.
faq.sensitiveSkin: Is it safe for sensitive skin?
faq.sensitiveSkinAnswer: Absolutely! All Nadara products are formulated with gentle, natural ingredients that are perfect for sensitive skin. We avoid harsh chemicals, synthetic fragrances, and artificial preservatives. Our products are dermatologically tested and hypoallergenic. However, we always recommend doing a patch test before first use.
faq.deliveryReturns: What are your delivery & return policies?
faq.deliveryReturnsAnswer: We offer worldwide shipping! Standard delivery takes 5-10 business days, while express shipping arrives in 2-4 business days. We accept returns within 30 days of delivery for unopened products in their original packaging. Shipping is free on orders over $75.
faq.ingredientsTransparency: How transparent are you about ingredients?
faq.ingredientsTransparencyAnswer: Complete transparency is at the heart of what we do. Every product page lists the full INCI ingredient list, along with the origin and benefits of each key ingredient. We source directly from certified organic farms in Morocco and maintain full traceability. All our ingredients are 100% natural, cruelty-free, and sustainably sourced.
faq.contactCTA: Still have questions? We're here to help!

footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe for exclusive offers and skincare tips.
footer.description: Premium skincare rooted in Moroccan tradition. We blend ancient botanical wisdom with modern science.

about.heroSubtitle: A journey from the ancient beauty rituals of Morocco to your daily skincare sanctuary.
about.promiseSubtitle: Where Ancient Wisdom Meets Modern Beauty
about.promiseText1: Nadara was founded on a simple belief: that the most effective skincare comes from nature itself. Our journey began in the sun-drenched valleys of Morocco, where generations of women have guarded the secrets of botanical beauty.
about.promiseText2: We partner directly with women-led cooperatives, ensuring fair trade practices while preserving traditional extraction methods that have been perfected over centuries. Every drop of our oils, every gram of our clay masks, carries the essence of this heritage.
about.promiseText3: Today, Nadara brings these treasures to discerning customers worldwide, never compromising on purity, potency, or our commitment to the planet.
about.sustainabilityTitle: Beauty That Cares for Our Planet
about.sustainabilityText1: Sustainability isn't an afterthought—it's woven into every aspect of what we do. From sourcing to shipping, we minimize our environmental footprint without compromising on quality.
about.sustainabilityText2: Our packaging is made from recycled and recyclable materials. We use glass bottles, biodegradable labels, and plastic-free shipping materials. Our formulas are biodegradable and never tested on animals.
about.ctaTitle: Ready to Begin Your Beauty Journey?
about.ctaSubtitle: Explore our collection of premium Moroccan skincare and discover the transformative power of pure, natural ingredients.

contact.heroTitle: We'd Love to Hear from You
contact.heroDescription: Have questions about our products, need skincare advice, or ready to place an order? Our team is here to help.
